task_list.instruction_title:
Execute controls the below controls and send results to SGPBCHMigrationCoordination:

C5540 Forex Forwards : - Deal transfers with balance anomalies. SGU
C5560 Forex Forwards : - Deal transfers with other anomalies. SGU
C5580 Forex Forwards : - Deal transfers without anomalies. SGU

Execute controls the below controls and send results to SGPBCHMigrationCoordination:

C6007 List of UBP current accounts issued of the SGPBCH migration

Execute controls the below controls and send results to SGPBCHMigrationCoordination:

C5100 List of blocked positions
